scripts.clean: start yarn cleanUpClient && start yarn cleanApi
scripts.cleanClient: cd next-client &&  start yarn cleanupClient && exit
scripts.test: start yarn startApi && start yarn startClient
scripts.dev: start yarn startApi && start yarn startClient && start yarn open-browser && exit
scripts.devv: start http://localhost:3333 && start yarn startApi && start yarn startClient
scripts.mobile: start yarn startMobile && start yarn startClient
scripts.installWithStartUp: start yarn install && start yarn dev
scripts.install: start yarn installClient && start yarn installApi && start yarn apiPrismaDbPush
scripts.installClient: cd next-client &&  start yarn install && start yarn dev
scripts.installApi: cd api-prisma && start yarn install && start yarn dev
scripts.apiPrismaDbPush: cd api-prisma && npx prisma db push --exit
scripts.apiPrismaGenerate: cd api-prisma && start npx prisma generate --exit 1
